spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ziraj is a 10th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma. He has the following paladin spells prepared:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ziraj makes three attacks with his glaive or with his oversized longbow.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Oversized Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dreadful Aspect (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Ziraj exudes magical menace. Each enemy within 30 feet of him must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute of Ziraj. If a {@condition frightened} enemy ends its turn more than 30 feet away from Ziraj, the enemy can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
